Properties.ProtectedString:
function waitforchild(parent,child) while not parent:FindFirstChild(child) do wait() print(parent.Name .. " Waiting for " .. child) end return parent[child] end
local Tool=script.Parent local Handle= waitforchild(Tool,'Handle') local EvilSound = waitforchild(Handle,'evilSound') local BoneScript = waitforchild(Tool, 'BoneDamageScript') local SpinAni=waitforchild(script,'spin') local SpinAniTrack local ThrustAni=waitforchild(script,'Thrust') local ThrustAniTrack local PoundAni=waitforchild(script,'StaffPound') local PoundAniTrack
local lastClick
local MyHumanoid
local bVel= Instance.new('BodyVelocity') bVel.maxForce=Vector3.new(9999999,0,9999999) local thrustSpeed=20
local bRot= Instance.new('BodyAngularVelocity') bRot.maxTorque=Vector3.new(9999999,99999999,9999999) bRot.angularvelocity=Vector3.new(0,25,0)
function InitializeBall() local tball=Instance.new('Part') tball.Size = Vector3.new(18.36, 18.36, 18.36) tball.Elasticity = 0 tball.Shape = 'Ball' local tmesh=Instance.new('SpecialMesh') tmesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=99795003" tmesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=99795207" tmesh.Scale = Vector3.new(50,50,50) local tfire = Instance.new('Fire') tfire.Color=Color3.new(34/255,106/255,12/256) tfire.SecondaryColor=Color3.new(121/255,255/255,84/255) tfire.Size=5 tfire.Parent=tball local tsmoke=Instance.new('Smoke') tsmoke.Color=Color3.new(51/255,168/255,38/255) tsmoke.Opacity=.25 tsmoke.Size=.1 tsmoke.RiseVelocity=0 tsmoke.Parent=tball
tmesh.Parent=tball tball.CanCollide=true
return tball
end
local CanThrustAttack=true function ThrustAttack() CanThrustAttack=false ThrustAniTrack:Play(.1,1,3) --Tool.Grip=CFrame.new(0, 1.50000012, 1.22391882e-007, 1, 0, 0, 0, -1, -8.74227766e-008, 0, 8.74227766e-008, -1) --Tool.Grip=CFrame.new(0, 1.76066029, 0.26066035, 1, 0, 0, 0, -0.707106829, 0.707106709, 0, -0.707106709, -0.707106829) local torso=waitforchild(Tool.Parent,'Torso') local direction=torso.CFrame.lookVector wait(1) --Tool.Grip=CFrame.new(0, 1.39999998, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1)
CanThrustAttack=true end
local CanSpinAttack=true function SpinAttack() CanSpinAttack=false local torso=waitforchild(Tool.Parent,'Torso') SpinAniTrack:Play(.1,1,2) --Tool.Grip=CFrame.new(0, 2, 1.22391882e-007, 1, 0, 0, 0, -1, -8.74227766e-008, 0, 8.74227766e-008, -1) bRot.Parent=torso wait(1) bRot.Parent=nil SpinAniTrack:Stop() --Tool.Grip=CFrame.new(0, 1.39999998, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) CanSpinAttack=true end
local CanSpawnBall=true function SpawnBall() CanSpawnBall=false --Tool.Grip=CFrame.new(0, 1.39999998, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) PoundAniTrack:Play(.1,1,2) wait(1) EvilSound:Play() local torso=waitforchild(Tool.Parent,'Torso') local direction=torso.CFrame.lookVector
local tball = InitializeBall() local tbvel=bVel:Clone() local tscript=BoneScript:Clone() tscript.Parent=tball tscript.Disabled=false tbvel.velocity=(direction*thrustSpeed)+(Vector3.new(math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5)*thrustSpeed) tbvel.Parent=tball tball.CFrame=torso.CFrame+(direction*10)+Vector3.new(0,20,0) tball.Parent=Tool game.Debris:AddItem(tball,10) wait(.25)
CanSpawnBall=true end
function OnClick() if CanThrustAttack and CanSpawnBall then ThrustAttack() elseif CanSpawnBall then SpawnBall() end
end
function OnUnequip() if SpinAniTrack then SpinAniTrack:Stop() SpinAniTrack.Parent=nil end if ThrustAniTrack then ThrustAniTrack.Parent=nil end if PoundAniTrack then PoundAniTrack.Parent=nil end bVel.Parent=nil bRot.Parent=nil CanSpinAttack=true CanThrustAttack=true end
Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequip)
function OnEquip(mouse) MyHumanoid=waitforchild(Tool.Parent,'Humanoid') SpinAniTrack=MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(SpinAni) ThrustAniTrack=MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(ThrustAni) PoundAniTrack=MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(PoundAni) mouse.Button1Down:connect(OnClick) --Tool.Grip=CFrame.new(0, 1.39999998, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquip)

local Damage=9
while not script.Parent:FindFirstChild('Handle') do wait() end local Handle=script.Parent.Handle
function TagHumanoid(Humanoid, Player) if Humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = Player creatorTag.Parent = Humanoid game.Debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function OnTouched(Part) HitHumanoid = Part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myHumanoid = script.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(script.Parent.Parent)
if HitHumanoid and myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= HitHumanoid then print('getting here') rightArm = myHumanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm then rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") print('getting there') if rightGrip and (rightGrip.Part0 == Handle or rightGrip.Part1 == Handle) then print('doing damage') TagHumanoid(HitHumanoid, myPlayer) HitHumanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) end end end end
script.Parent.Handle.Touched:connect(OnTouched)

local Damage=20
local Handle=script.Parent
function TagHumanoid(Humanoid, Player) if Humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = Player creatorTag.Parent = Humanoid game.Debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 2) end end
local function weldBetween(a, b) local weld = Instance.new("Weld") weld.Part0 = a weld.Part1 = b weld.C0 = CFrame.new() weld.C1 = b.CFrame:inverse() * a.CFrame weld.Parent = a return weld; end
function OnTouched(Part) HitHumanoid = Part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myHumanoid = Handle.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Handle.Parent.Parent)
if HitHumanoid and myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= HitHumanoid then print('getting here') rightArm = myHumanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm then TagHumanoid(HitHumanoid, myPlayer) HitHumanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) if HitHumanoid.Health<25 then
for _,i in pairs(Part.Parent:GetChildren()) do if i:IsA('Part') then local tpart = i:Clone() tpart.Parent=Handle weldBetween(Handle,tpart) end end
for _,i in pairs(Part.Parent:GetChildren()) do if i:IsA('Part') then i:Destroy() end end
end end end end
script.Parent.Touched:connect(OnTouched)
